description:
Nishikaze shows up in front of Suigin and gives him a message from Temujin. The boss of Stage 0, Aslan, finally shows up and steals all of the players’ blood, but it also appears that he’s searching for someone. Suigin appears, and Aslan finds who he’s looking for.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 最後のカウントダウン
